```pddl
(:action purchase
  ; Purchase or acquire an item and update its status
  :parameters (?p - player ?item - item ?location - location)
  :precondition (and
    (at ?p ?location)
    (or (and (at ?item ?location) (for_sale ?item ?location))
        (stored ?location ?item))
  )
  :effect (and
    (inventory ?p ?item)
    (not (at ?item ?location))
    (not (stored ?location ?item))
  )
)

(:action store_eraser
  :parameters (?p - player ?eraser - item ?car - location)
  :precondition (and (inventory ?p ?eraser) (at ?p ?car))
  :effect (and (stored ?car ?eraser) (not (inventory ?p ?eraser)))
)

(:action store
  ; Store an item in a location
  :parameters (?p - player ?item - item ?location - location)
  :precondition (and (inventory ?p ?item) (at ?p ?location))
  :effect (and (stored ?location ?item) (not (inventory ?p ?item)))
)

(:action use
  ; Utilize a resource to achieve a desired state change
  :parameters (?p - player ?resource - item ?target - item ?location - location)
  :precondition (and (at ?p ?location) (stored ?location ?resource) (needs_transformation ?target))
  :effect (and (transformed ?target) (not (needs_transformation ?target)))
)
```
